entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -23.2°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
